#summary Split a HTML page into multiple pages along the headers.
#labels Tool

= Introduction =

This is a python script to split a HTML page into multiple pages.

It was tested with the [http://www.w3.org/ w3c specifications]. It will likely fail with other files without change.

= Usage =

{{{
htmlsplit.py html ...
}}}


= Download =

  * [http://htmlhelp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/garbooks/scripts/htmlsplit.py Subversion repository]
